text: Jose Kevin Bonilla (born September 20, 2001) is an American collegiate soccer player who plays as a defender for the Portland Pilots. ==References== ==External links== * * Kevin Bonilla (Jose Bonilla) at FC Dallas Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:North Texas SC players Category:Soccer players from Texas Category:Sportspeople from Dallas Category:USL League One players
title: Kevin Bonilla
